title: [K-12] Blended Learning Environment Mathematics Learning Attitude and Performance Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematical Concepts and Fundamental Knowledge of Engineering Mathematics
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning combining VR simulations with Learning Management Systems (LMS) in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners complete at least 80% of VR simulation activities weekly in a blended learning environment, improving situational interest by at least 20%.
Learners demonstrate sustained learning engagement by maintaining interaction frequency (at least three times weekly) on the LMS platform through self-regulated learning.
Learners achieve academic performance improvement of at least 15% compared to the previous semester in summative assessments.

resources: Smartphone Adapter Rental System for VR Simulation
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
